name: Joint PhD computational astrophysics Stellenbosch and Groningen
institutes: Astrophysics group, Stellenbosch University (South Africa), Kapetyn Astronomical Institute of University of Groningen (Netherlands)
status: Applied, waiting to hear from them.
comments: They have an AI/ML, radio astronomy and CMB focus.

name: University of Chile
status: Started working on it, first draft almost ready.
comments: They posted an advertisement very close to the deadline, but I am glad that they did. I have a strong interest in this place. They will send emails to refeeres regarding reference letters.

name: University of Western Australia
institutes: International Centre for Radio Astronomy Research
comments: I need to provide referee email addresses to them, they may reach out (looks like it prima facie, shall write to you if otherwise).
